text.jpText:
サトノダイヤモンドが初のGⅠレースに
出走する前日、彼女の両親から
激励の電話がかかってきた。
text.enText:
The day before Satono Diamond was to run in 
her first G1 race, I received a phone call 
from her parents A day before Satono Diamond 
was to run in her first G1 race, her parents 
called to give her a pep talk.

text.jpText:
サトノダイヤモンドは、これまでウマ娘界に
貢献してきた両親を尊敬している。ゆえに
2人にGⅠ勝利を届けたいのだと語った。
text.enText:
Satono Diamond respects her parents who have 
contributed to the horsegirl world. 
Therefore, she wants to deliver a G1 victory 
to both of them. Satono Diamond said she 
wants to deliver a G1 victory to both of them.
